Articles.Content:
My account was deleted in that one attack and now I've finally gotten around to returning.

So, what's up?
Well it good to see you back from that horrible account disaster. Feel free to ask questions and ideas anytime!

Welcome (back) to the forums!

I'll second austin -- if you've ever got any questions about something you're stuck on, the friendly and knowledgeable folks in the How To section won't mind helping you out. You can also take a look at the Drawing Board (link in my sig) for tutorials and reference material.

Happy landings!
